scripts.say: Wow, this rigging is amazing! I never expected weapons this powerful to be so easy to control!
With OP gear like this, even a pure and delicate girl like me can become a ganking queen at the drop of a hat!
(The rigging Purity made doesn't function the same way as ours...)
(Even then, you can't simply equip a ship's rigging and master its use immediately. The Mirror Sea must be affecting her somehow.)
Anyway, now I have the power to protect my friends! Hooray!
Oh yeah, why can't we just get riggings for everyone then face the Sirens head-on?
They might have numbers, but we're way stronger. We'd beat them in the blink of an eye.
There is some truth to that, but reality isn't so simple.
Besides... a world where any random person can pick up arms and go to war is destined to fall to ruin.
Wowie! Kawakaze: cute on the outside, cool on the inside! There's an audience for characters like that, you know!
I can't pull that off, though. I don't know much about your world, and I'm not much of a fighter either, so sorry if I say anything that sounds weird!
You don't know how to fight? I thought you're part of the Resistance?
I've fought a few times before! Just not, you know, like this. Ahahaha~
What a strange place you come from...
Aww, don't be like that! Experience is still experience!
